message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $110, which would be $115. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession. I'll meet you at $114. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still need to stretch my budget a bit further. Would you be willing to go down to $112 again?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll meet you at $113. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $111?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $113. That's my final counteroffer. Take it or leave it.
